text: The United States Post Office and Federal Building is a post office building in La Grande, Oregon. It is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. It now functions as the La Grande city hall. ==See also== * List of United States Post Offices * National Register of Historic Places listings in Union County, Oregon ==References== Category:Federal buildings in the United States Category:1913 establishments in Oregon Category:Government buildings completed in 1913 Category:City and town halls on the National Register of Historic Places in Oregon Category:Colonial Revival architecture in Oregon Category:La Grande, Oregon Category:National Register of Historic Places in Union County, Oregon Category:Post office buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Oregon
title: United States Post Office and Federal Building (La Grande, Oregon)
